It is possible to choose among the following teachings as for Optional subjects III: SOILS AND QUALITY INDICATORS [AGRICULTURAL PEDOLOGY], AGRICULTURAL PEDOLOGY [SOIL QUALITY INDICATORS], SOIL QUALITY INDICATORS, SOIL EVALUATION AND RECOMPOSITION [SOIL EVALUATION], SOIL EVALUATION [RECOVERY OF DEGRADED AREAS], RECOVERY OF DEGRADED AREAS. It is possible to choose among the following teachings as for Optional subjects IV: BUSINESS ORGANISATION AND MANAGEMENT AND FOREST VALUATION [FOREST VALUATION - WORKSHOP], FOREST VALUATION - WORKSHOP [ORGANISATION AND STRATEGIC MANAGEMENT OF AGRO-FOREST BUSINESS], ORGANISATION AND STRATEGIC MANAGEMENT OF AGRO-FOREST BUSINESS, EU AGRICULTURAL POLICY AND TERRITORIAL EVALUATION [EU AGRICULTURAL POLICY], EU AGRICULTURAL POLICY [LAND VALUATION WORKSHOP], LAND VALUATION WORKSHOP. It is possible to choose among the following teachings as for Free subjects: AGRO-ENERGIES, APPLIED AGRO-METEOROLOGY, ENHANCEMENT OF RURAL VILLAGES, PHYTOPATHOLOGICAL DIAGNOSTICS, NATURALISTIC ENGINEERING TECHNIQUES, GREEN MARKETING AND ENVIRONMENTAL CERTIFICATIONS.  For more information visit the course website http://www.unipa.it/struttura.html?id=2029.
